nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                rule addCounter(0) => .
          
          
            
                rule <k> addCounter(0) => . ... </k>
          
      
    
    
  

I want to get people out of the habit of omitting <k> tags. It makes it quite confusing in definitions which use a lot of functions.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7,12 +7,19 @@ module VERIF-SYNTAX
     rule foo => 3 [macro]
 
     syntax Pgm ::= doIt ( Int )
+    syntax Pgm ::= addCounter ( Int )
 endmodule
 
 module VERIF
     imports VERIF-SYNTAX
 
-    configuration <k> $PGM:Pgm </k>
+    configuration <k> $PGM:Pgm </k> <counter> 1 </counter> <sum> 0 </sum>
+
+    rule addCounter(0) => .
